Items.name: Zooby Prism
Items.description: Zooby Prism is designed for elegance and clarity in small network nodes. Built for modular edge processing and environmental resilience.

Items.name: Zooby Flux
Items.description: The Zooby Flux is a next-gen hub for hybrid mesh networks with precision sensing and real-time diagnostics built in.

Items.name: Zooby Orb
Items.description: Zooby Orb delivers immersive diagnostics and interactive lighting, ideal for tech-forward installations and visibility-critical zones.

Items.name: Zooby Core
Items.description: The Zooby Core is built for backhaul resilience and mission-critical data routing in remote or redundant system cores.

Items.name: Zooby Halo
Items.description: A marvel of design and connectivity, the Zooby Halo adapts to its environment with dazzling LED indicators and smart balancing.
